# Development dependencies
-r requirements.txt
build >= 1.0.0
pkginfo >= 1.12
pytest >= 8.0.0
pytest-mock >= 3.12.0
pytest-watcher >= 0.4.1
twine >= 6.0.0

# Adds the library itself as an editable path, allowing for module name resolution
# in REPL and pytest, without manually setting PYTHONPATH.
-e .
